The Kardashians have opened up about their beauty secrets and hacks that have worked a dream for them.

The reality TV stars shared their thoughts with Kourtney Kardashian's lifestyle website Poosh and they are something that can be achievable for pretty much everyone.

The 40-year-old Keeping Up With The Kardashian star has found success with Poosh and it's mix of lifestyle and beauty tips has gone down a storm with fans of the family hailing the site.

In one of its latest blog instalments, the sisters have shared their secrets and hacks and each have given one top tip for everyday use.

Check them out below.

Kourtney Kardashian

(Image: Instagram)

Kourtney's tip comes from the shower and it involves repeating a process.

She said: “Double washing my body in the shower. I wash my body while conditioning my hair and then rinse it out and then wash my body again using a special body wash recommended by a dermatologist."

Khloe Kardashian

Khloe has a fantastic way of repairing broken makeup, which she swears by.

The 35-year-old told Poosh: "“If you shattered one of your bronzers, eye shadows, or really any makeup, do not toss out.

(Image: khloe kardashian/Instagram)

"Gather up the broken makeup and put it back into its container. Crush up any pieces that haven’t completely broken up yet.

"Add a couple drops of rubbing alcohol to the crushed makeup. Use your finger, the back of a spoon, or anything, really, to rub and smooth out the alcohol and the makeup.

"Leave overnight. When you wake up in the morning, your makeup will be good as new and there will be no alcohol smell."

Kris Jenner

Momager Kris has shared her way of exfoliating.

The 63-year-old said: “Wash your face every night using a hot terry cloth washcloth.

(Image: instagram)

"It acts as a natural exfoliant by loosening dead skin cells, opens up the pores, and softens the skin, prepping it for your night treatments."

Kim Kardashian West

The 39-year-old mum of four has kept it simple. Her tip is: "I love overlining my lips with a darker lip liner."

That's it. Simple.

(Image: GC Images)

Kendall Jenner

Supermodel Kendall, 23, likes to have a home comfort when she is travelling but it does serve a hygienic purpose as well.

She shared: "Travel with your own pillowcase.

(Image: Getty Images)

"This will help avoid breakouts while on your trip and give you peace of mind knowing you’re resting your face on clean cases."

Kylie Jenner

(Image: Instagram)

Billionaire makeup mogul Kylie naturally kept on brand when sharing her tip, pointing fans towards one of her own products.

The 22-year-old said: “To make a spray tan last longer, moisturize with body lotion every day - my Kylie Skin Body Lotion is my go-to."
